abstract: Donald R. Keough, a former top executive at the Coca-Cola Company, has turned his speech about how to fail in business — using the example of his own failure with New Coke — into a book.
snippet: Donald R. Keough, a former top executive at the Coca-Cola Company, has turned his speech about how to fail in business — using the example of his own failure with New Coke — into a book.
lead_paragraph: DONALD R. KEOUGH, a former top executive at the Coca-Cola Company, has been delivering a cautionary speech for decades about how to fail in business. Some of his most colorful examples are his own failures  like New Coke.

headline.main: How to Fail in Business, a Guide to Success
headline.print_headline: How to Fail in Business, a Guide to Success
